&CommandCheckLockedDate; -- CommandCheckVoucherNumber declare @$exists nvarchar(512), @$idVoucherNumber char(13), @$nextVoucherNumber nvarchar(33), @$checkVoucherNumber nvarchar(4000), @$checkVoucherBook nvarchar(4000) select @$checkVoucherNumber = '' select @$exists = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Số chứng từ %s không đúng hoặc đã có trong chứng từ.' else N'The invoice number %s is invalid or already exists.' end select @$checkVoucherBook = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Kiểm tra lại ngày hiệu lực của quyển chứng từ %s.' else N'Check the effective date of book vouchers %s.' end if @ma_nk <> '' if not exists (select 1 from v20dmnk where ma_nk = @ma_nk and ((@ngay_ct >= ngay_hl_tu or ngay_hl_tu is null) and (@ngay_ct <= ngay_hl_den or ngay_hl_den is null))) begin select replace(@$checkVoucherBook, '%s', replace(replace(replace(rtrim(@ma_nk), '&', '&'), '<', '<'), '>', '>')) as message return end declare @so_ct_tmp varchar(32) select @so_ct_tmp = @so_ct create table #checkNumber (r int) select @so_ct_tmp = space(datalength(@so_ct_tmp) - len(rtrim(@so_ct_tmp))) + rtrim(@so_ct_tmp), @$idVoucherNumber = case when @@action = 'New' then '' else @stt_rec end insert into #checkNumber exec AI_ERP$App$CheckVoucherNumber @ma_nk, @@id, @ngay_ct, @so_ct_tmp, 'c43$000000', @$idVoucherNumber, @$nextVoucherNumber output if @$nextVoucherNumber <> '' begin select @$checkVoucherNumber = case when @@language = 'v' then N'
Số mới đề nghị là %v, bạn có chọn số chứng từ này không?' else N'
%v is a system-generated number, do you want to use this number?' end select @$checkVoucherNumber = replace(@$checkVoucherNumber, '%v', replace(replace(replace(rtrim(@$nextVoucherNumber), '&', '&'), '<', '<'), '>', '>')) end if exists(select * from #checkNumber where r = 0) begin if (@$nextVoucherNumber <> '') select 'so_ct' as field, '$Firm' + replace(@$exists, '%s', replace(replace(replace(rtrim(@so_ct_tmp), '&', '&'), '<', '<'), '>', '>')) + @$checkVoucherNumber as message, 'this.setItemValue("so_ct", "' + replace(replace(rtrim(@$nextVoucherNumber), '\', '\\'), '"', '\"') + '");this._findButton("Ok").focus();' as script else select replace(@$exists, '%s', replace(replace(replace(rtrim(@so_ct_tmp), '&', '&'), '<', '<'), '>', '>')) as message return end select '' as field, '' as message, 'this.grid._allocationBehavior.process();' as script return
